classifier

Class connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • classifier.connection

  • public class connection
extends java.lang.Object
    The connection class has the purpose of saving information about the connections in the graph. Since the graph uses directed connections, instead of storing each node the connections between them are stored and how they relate (probability of different values) Each connection object encapsulates information about the direction of the connection (parent and son) and how the son's values are affected by the parent
